NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/DIV.I(Weapon) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:  03 /07/2012 
 
 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 13 /2012 
 
 
Subject :  Permission for Carriage of Arms,Ammunition & explosives by                    
                  Department  of Home, Govt. of Jharkhand. 
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA Permit No.377-AA/2012, issued under reference  
No.8/33/2009-IR dated 08.06.2012 regarding authorization to Department of 
Home, Govt. of Jharkhand for carriage of arms, ammunition & explosives from 
time to time in helicopter of Govt. of Jharkhand, Regn. No.VT-HAP, in 
connection with anti-naxalite operations in Jharkhand and adjoining States is 
forwarded herewith for information and necessary action by all concerned.  
 
2.              This permit is valid upto 31/05/2013. 
 
Encl:         As above.  
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
